context: Hi how are you? What kind of movies do you enjoy?
Great! Thanks. I like epic historical pieces. And recommendations?

I recently saw Black Panther (2018) and it was amazing I also really enjoyed both Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) and Guardians (2017) How about Schindler's List (1993) have you seen that? I hear its hard to watch but a great production of it.
Yes, and i really liked it. Any other World War 2 movies you can think of?
Not sure which war.. but a good war movie I always liked was Saving Private Ryan (1998) It's on my list of favorites.
Look at that! I'm better than I thought lol I do remember my dad loving the Wings (1927) movie
I also think that Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989) is a World War 2 movie technically.
Oh cool. I'm really bad with history lol but I do enjoy movies based on war. It's interesting at the very least.
Indeed. Have you seen Captain America: The First Avenger ?
I slacked and haven't seen Captain America: Civil War (2016)
You don’t have to watch it to understand Avengers: Infinity War (2018) .
entity: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
resp: Awesome, that's next on my list too! Although, I haven't seen Thor: Ragnarok (2017) I hear seeing that before Avengers: Infinity War (2018) is recommended
